title: r/Entitledparents My Kids Need A Place To Live, So GIVE ME YOUR HOUSE! 😇🙏
description: r/Entitledparents This poor, struggling mom just wants a place for her babies to live comfortably. So does she go get a job and buy an apartment herself? NOPE! She pressures OP into literally just giving her a house for free. And as a show of gratitude, this entitled mother will *let* OP live in the house that she purchased (in the guestroom, of course). How very gracious of this entitled parent 🙄
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
